    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La razón áurea</string>
            <string language="en">The golden number</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die goldene Zahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le nombre d'or</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O número dourado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il numero dorato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο χρυσός αριθμός</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de número áureo. Se defina el número y se muestran algunas imágenes en las que aparece.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the golden ratio. The number is defined and some images in which it can be seen are shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">rectangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">número áureo</string>
            <string language="en">golden number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporción</string>
            <string language="en">proportion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das goldene Verhältnis zu erklären. Die Zahl 
wird definiert und einige Bilder, in denen es gesehen werden kann, 
werden gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le taux d'or. Le nombre est défini et 
quelques images dans lesquelles il peut voir sont montrées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar a
relação dourada. O número é definido e algumas imagens em 
que se pode ver são mostradas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare
il rapporto dorato. Il numero è definito ed alcune immagini in 
cui può essere visto sono indicate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τη χρυσή αναλογία. Ο αριθμός καθορίζεται 
και μερικές εικόνες στις οποίες μπορεί να δει 
εμφανίζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
